resources.string: MyFarm Mobile Android App is project which was done by Students of Gulu university, aimed at bringing closer, a quick solution to farmers, in relation to diseases that more often attack their farms.
Ochora Christopher, Emma, Jude, Mathew, Ivan, Kelly, Theodora
Source Code done using Native Android Studio \n This version of MyFarm is compiled from Android 3.1.2
You can send feedback to us about the App experience, Usability or even need to add a certain Farm Disease
